title: Services

content: Monthly Licensing Ops: we manage tools & subscriptions, keep Annex + receipts, reconcile costs monthly. Ops Automation: recurring tasks turned into workflows (approvals, notifications, docs, storage). Store-in-a-Week: from zero to live basic store (POD/FBA/affiliates), with a minimal playbook. Lean Campaigns: simple funnel, fast creatives, tight reporting and iteration.
summary:
• Monthly Licensing Ops: we manage tools & subscriptions, keep Annex + receipts, reconcile costs monthly.
  • Ops Automation: recurring tasks turned into workflows (approvals, notifications, docs, storage).
  • Store-in-a-Week: from zero to live basic store (POD/FBA/affiliates), with a minimal playbook.
  • Lean Campaigns: simple funnel, fast creatives, tight reporting and iteration.
